data.message:
My name is David Dumitru and I write to you from another account of the desire to recover my own.I forgot the password from the mail and from the facebook account. The mail is dumitrudavid66@yahoo.com and my page link is https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100005144326639&fref=ts  .
I'm interested in knowing if I can get it back and I can prove with a picture of my  identity act that it's about me. Thank you!

replies.message: Hi David. You may be able to get back into your Facebook account by answering a security question, using an alternate email address listed on your account or getting help from friends. You can learn more here: http://bit.ly/2uaC7sJ. -Pri
